content.detailedDescription: a police co-worker and i were bass fishing on rodman reservoir, which is near the ocala national forest.  we were fishing all night long and were the only ones on the water at the time,  i think it was around 3 a.M. when we both spotted what looked like fluorescent green light emitting from ���windows��� of some type of craft that was submerged in about 8 ft. of water.  we were only about 25 ft. from this thing and dwight wanted me to go to it but, i declined (ok, scared) and i moved the boat in the other direction.  it was totally dark that night and there was nothing nearby to cause a light reflection.  when i got home that morning, i told my wife about it and drew a picture of what it looked like.  she more or less blew it off, that is, until the following day.  there was an article in the paper about people in the ocala forest area reporting a ufo and in the paper, they had an artist���s drawing of what the people described.  i found the piece of paper i���d made my drawing on and showed it to my wife.  they were identical..!!  this took place, i���m thinking in the summer of  1993 or 1994���not sure of the exact year.
content.summary: It was submerged in rodman reservoir.  myself and another police officer saw lights coming from "windows" of it.

content.detailedDescription: Fireball in the sky travelling towards me and when exactly 70 degrees to my right side above me looked like it had stopped moving but i relised it went upwards and got smaller into space.The most astonishing thing i have seen.
content.summary: Fireball in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Sept. 1957 i was on a night flying fish trip with my cousin and her young girl.  the boat was open air, the night was clear and boat loaded with tourist (all older retired)  being from alaska i was use to seeing fish but had always looked up, as i did then.  as far as i remember the boast was in a direction from st. catherine hotel beach toward calif. in a ne direction.  (as i recall at the time this was so very high and in the northern area of calif.)  all of a sudden a large obect, sphere or round, appeared.  as i watched small ones came to the ship and otheres were leaving , coming and going.  of course, i had no idea how many or if the same ones.  now a second object (lge) appeared to the east of the lge one.  couldn't tell if it was the same size or just farther away;however, the same objects were coming and going to it also then a few started going between the two lge spheres.  during this time i did get extremely interested in what was going on and asked my cousin to watch, which she glanced up and started the flying fish thing again.  i then asked anyone on board to look and none responded!!!!The journey ended and we were back on the beach never to see the ufo again.   however, here is another event i experienced, but in alaska in  about 2002

my daughter and i had just brought our boat from seldovia to homer, docked it and started up the highway to anchorage. it was dark so must have been around eight pm. driving after anchor point on a straight away toward ninilchick (the ocean on my left or west of us) a crimson straight line shot across the highway about a foot or two off the ground traveled to the east , my radio went out, then the car stopped.After, what i thought to be a couple minutes, i tried to start the car , she took right off and away we went until out of the corner of my left eye i could see this same beam of light approaching again from the west.  same thing, radio out and car went dead, tried to start - nothing. after a "couple minutes" i started the car right up and got to a motel in soldotna at about midnight.  the trip should have taken us two hours but it took four plus hrs. to get there.  my mind was only on getting some rest not on what happened. just like it never happened or i forgot it.  later my daughter mentioned she wondered why the 2 hr trip took over 4 hrs..I couldn't reply to that.
years later she told me she thought we had been taken????

at the time of my sighing of ufos i was 20 yrs old and this second experience i was at least 65.  i am now 77 and wanted to write this down.
content.summary: 1 lge spere eject smaller one come to & fro 2nd lge sphere send and receive small spheres sm pheres back & forth between lge ones and space

content.detailedDescription: Went to bed following viewing of hbo series which ended at 10:00 pm.  we have a full wall of windows beside our bed which does not contain blinds or curtains.  we have a private property which contains 2 acres of trees and a small area where we have a fenced in back-yard with a small patch of sod/grass and landscaping.  while facing the window from bed, my husband asked me, "did you see the lights in the trees?".  at that time, i opened my eyes to look.  this was at 10:10 pm. i noticed a ball of light (approximately softball to basketball in size) which lit up from out of no where then traveled about 5 feet in a straight line then the light went out as quickly as it appeared. at that time, i asked my husband if what i witnessed was the same encounter he had, and it was.  the one he witnessed traveled in the opposite direction from the first one i witnessed.  we continued to watch out the window where i could see another one travel from the back of my neighbors property.  at that time, i was too afraid to open my eyes and continue to look. i was in complete disbelief as to what i saw. my husband and i had a brief conversation about what rationally could have just happened. i know what i saw, but i don't know what i saw.  there is no rational explanation or any thing i have ever seen that could even be compared to the event we witnessed. i do not know if it was a series of three different lighted orbs or if it was one orb making zig zag pattern from my property to the neighbors property.
content.summary: Three lighted orbs seen out our bedroom window.  it was dark outside.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of march 31, 2014, i was sitting on my porch, which is all glass, when i noticed an unusual red light (in fact, it appeared to be a circular shape illuminated red).  it was so different that i immediately grabbed the nearby binoculars.  through the binoculars, it appeared completely different from the single red light.  it was clearly two red lights on each side of a center bright white light (five lights total).  the difference in appearance from the naked eye was so startling that i looked several times both with the binoculars and the naked eye trying to reconcile the marked change from one to the other. 
although it was late dusk when i first looked at it through the binoculars, i could clearly see daylight above, below, and on both ends of it. it was just barely above the horizon and was moving very, very slowly from the west to east at a distance that i estimated to be about one mile from my location.  as it moved, it went below horizon level and continued east until i couldn't see it anymore.  
i am retired air force and have lived at this location for 26 years. we have both commercial and military airplanes and helicopters in this area; therefore, i am completely familiar with their appearance and sound. in no way did this object fit the profile of any conventional aircraft nor did the configuration of the lights on the craft.
i subsequently drew a rough sketch of the craft including the pattern of the lights.  i used this to inform my wife of what i had seen.  the next morning we were again sitting on the porch discussing the flight path of the unknown craft.  it was when i was pointing out how the craft flew below the horizon that we noticed power company trucks working on the lines at the exact point that i believed  was in the path the craft had taken.  during all the years that we have lived here, we have never seen any repairs done on any power lines in the area.  coincidence?  we were struck by the possibility of the connection between the two events and thus took pictures of the power crew working on the lines.  
the reason i have waited until now to report this is i thought, "who cares. it is going to be hard enough to explain it to my wife and sons. after all, this is the second one i have seen out here and neither time did i have any other witnesses."  i still can recall the first sighting as clear as can be even though it is years later and was a daytime sighting of a near collision between an unidentified cigar-shaped craft and a c130.
content.summary: Elongated shape, two red lights on each side of center white light. moved slowly, stayed near horizon, possibly damaged power line

content.detailedDescription:
I was working for a logging company in upstate ny. i brought my piece of logging equipment out to our landing to clean and refuel the machine for the next day.When i was done my duties i climbed into my pickup truck pulled it out into the open to watch my coworkers finish loading the last load of the day.As i look skyward there was a huge chrome sphere hovering just above the trees around 100 yards away.It was 5 p.M. skies were clear and this was a perfectly round object that looked like huge ball bearing or the ball from a pinball machine ...But if it was too land say...On a football field it would fill the stadium from sideline to sideline and end zone to end zone.The forest was reflecting off the base and the few clouds were reflecting off the top it didn't move at all ...It just seemed to be watching the wood chipper and a loader work.Everyone was so busy i could not get their attention to see it for themselves then i got scared and hopped back into my pickup looked upward and the object flew away and disappeared in a split second it was five minutes after 5.

few days later i heard that  swissair flight 127 reported seeing a ufo fly by them a few minutes later on the same day as my sighting dot dot dotmaybe it was the same object...It seems to be heading south east which would put it in the proximity of the pilots sighting.
content.summary: Huge chrome sphere watching logging operation

content.detailedDescription: Hi, i was standing outside my home having a cigarette then saw an object like a star but bigger moving eratically moving towards me then changing trajectory and heading of north into the sky before disapearing. i had my phone and took a video be patient it takes 5-10 seconds until object is visible. there was no noise but the strange thing is when i watched it back you can hear noises like the object is interferring with my cell phone. the noise you hear in the background at the start is our fish tank. any feedback would be very welcome to get your thoughts but this was very strange. thanks.
content.summary: Ufo sighting and video

content.detailedDescription: Hi, i was standing outside my home having a cigarette then saw an object like a star but bigger moving eratically moving towards me then changing trajectory and heading of north into the sky before disapearing. i had my phone and took a video be patient it takes 5-10 seconds until object is visible. there was no noise but the strange thing is when i watched it back you can hear noises like the object is interferring with my cell phone. the noise you hear in the background at the start is our fish tank. any feedback would be very welcome to get your thoughts but this was very strange. thanks.
content.summary: Ufo sighting and video

content.detailedDescription:
On the morning of january 11, 2014 at about 2:30 a.M.Hours, i was looking through my bedroom window, when suddenly a light came surging through street trees. i was watching and thinking it was a beam of light. however, it was not a flash of light, but a very large ball of white light that looked like a large diamond. she glowed but not blinding. i think she had about 2 feet diameter because he was at a distance of 50 meters above the treetops. interestingly they had no trace of light and it was not a meteor. she stood there for about 10 seconds and then just walked away and disappeared. curious fact that the day before foreign objects were observed in stage of werder bremen, germany. 
what could this be?
thanks and regards
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: The u.F.O looks like a esphere diamond.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking with my family and friends in the centre of bratislava, slovakia. 
i was looking at the sky, when i saw a sphere-shaped object: i first thought that it was a star, but then i realized it was 3:00 pm and the shaped was perfect; it certainly couldn't have been a star!!!
the object stood still in the air, about 800 meters from the ground, after about 10 seconds, it started moving and doing strange movements in the air. i was frightened and shocked because i had never seen something like that before. i was also curious because i continued watching it until it disappeared in the sky.
content.summary: Object in sky

content.detailedDescription: Around 8:10pm 4/20/14 i was headed home to moore,ok. from blanchard,ok.I was traveling north and noticed a bright light in the sky northeast of me. the light didn't beam off of the object, it was more florescent and stayed with the object as the light was the object.  i went over every possible idea of what it could have been. it was larger than any aircraft light. i know as big as this light was, i was positive i would have seen the actual aircraft. i did not see anything else, except that light. i looked for beams going up and or down off of this light and nothing was there. i can still see it in my mind. the bright light went a little right and then a zig up left and then right again and then it was gone. i have never doubted nor have i believed there are ufo's and other such things. i do believe this however was completely odd and not meant to be where it was and i still can't believe i saw i saw.
content.summary: Bright light hovering

content.detailedDescription: From 8:34 to 8:41 pm, noticed 7 bright red lights appear in western sky.  they moved relatively slowly bearing 11 o'clock towards the southwest sky, rising until they disappeared.  there were no green/white lights indicating they were aircraft, nor did the lights blink.  the lights were relatively equally spaced out, roughly 60 seconds between one another.
content.summary: 7 red lights, spaced about 60 sec apart, bearing 11oclock from west to southwest

content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Tringle with an razer edge ,4 lites

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were on the trampoline in my back yard enjoying the nice weather and looking at the stars.  i noticed something moving when it was over half way out of my field of view, it was so dim it almost matched the sky and it was  a gray circle with three dimly lit greenish lights, i blinked a few times because i thought i was seeing things and i asked my boyfriend if he saw it, or sees it, and i pointed. there was another beside it with two of its lights out and one a distance away with one light out. the were perfectly lined up with one another flying same speed. my boyfriend didn't see it because he wasn't wearing his glasses, and i am super mad at him because he still doesn't believe me even though i basically screamed and tried to show him what i saw for about 5 seconds before it was out of sight due to the trees overhead...It was moving at a steady pace like many airplanes had done when they were flying overhead. after it happened i argued with my boyfriend for a minute or two and was saying there was no way he couldn't have seen it as well.  i then started getting a bit scared and went inside and drew a picture of them and was shaky and a little bit crying. then my boyfriend still didn't believe me and i looked online and found a picture of one that looked similar to what i saw and had to be the same type of craft. i've been trying to find more like it on the web, decided to report mine in case anyone else saw the same ones i did last night. i lost sight of objects when the were beyond my field of view due to trees overhead blocking vision of the sky.
content.summary: Laying out on trampoline watching stars and planes , i observed  3 ufo's  flying overhead and they were so dim i almost missed them

content.detailedDescription: Appx 2020 hrs lying on couch in den. two glowing red orbs appeared in my window facing west. orbs slightly pulsating and next to each horizontally traveling southerly from north west. after they disappeared behind my neighbors roof line, i jumped up and told my wife. i grabbed my cellphone and went out front door and wife followed. we were both in driveway and saw the two orbs meet up with a third red orb which was stationary in line with my street. the two appeared to go above the third then travel either upwards or westerly, one at a time. each of the two slowly faded out. then the third traveled in the same direction of the first pair and faded slowly. it was dusk so there was still some faint sunlight on the horizon. lasted appx 3-4 mins. unfortunately i didn't hit the record button on my cellphone correctly and have no video.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 glowing red orbs met a 3rd glowing red orb

content.detailedDescription:
This photo was taken by a person i know. he sent me the photo yesterday and told me to observe the white specs, which most of them could be seen as outlining a triangle of different sizes. i marked the photo and made a copy of it. i am including the original and the marked copy 

he was just shooting up at random at the chemtrails and saw this after looking at them on the pc.

no big deal, but it is interesting that some if them outline triangle like shapes.
content.summary: Specs in triabgular form found on photos of the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the stars then notice one take off in fast rate of speed was very high in the sky had no trail just a bright white light then slowed , went blank disappeared for about 2-3 seconds then appeared at a much different altitude and flight path then slowly hooked around and and darted off the same way it was heading got just about out of sight when another one appeared out of know where and was heading in a totally different direction at a constant speed and at the hight it seemed to be was much to fast and high in the sky to be any airplane i have ever seen in the area also this was not the first sighting also seen 3-4 others on about the 5th of april also .
content.summary: Apeared to be a star but then took off fast

content.detailedDescription: My son kamdin and i were coming across the snake river heading north east on the bridge by simplots when i saw a triangle shaped object hovering just above the simplots plant. the object was dark gray/black. it was only a couple hundred feet above the plant so i could see all the detail in the bottom of the object. it made absolutely no sound and had no lights. it was about 7pm so the sun was already at the west horizon. so i could not see any lights. it slowly started moving northeast at a very very slow speed. we were on our way home which is only about half a mile from when we saw this object. instead of turning left after the bridge to go home i stayed on the burley rupert highway and tried to follow it to get a longer better look. we were able to follow it almost 6 miles when it changed direction and went east where i could no longer keep up with it. i was very excited to follow this object and hoped i would be able to get closer but could not. after seeing this object i told anyone who would listen , especially some co-workers who have had their own sightings. one guy has had many and more interesting than mine. i have no sketch but could sketch what we saw if needed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: My son kamdin an i came across the bridge and i told him that there was something flying above simplots. we watched it and followed it until ee couldnt.

content.detailedDescription: Was looking at mars when i saw a red/white light disappearing and reappearing in the sky. it stopped moving for a few minutes and then suddenly disappeared. it reappeared a few seconds later a great distance southeast of where it disappeared from. i've never seen anything move that quickly across the sky. crazy!!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright red and white light disappearing and reappearing in the sky. eventually stopped and then moved very slowly across sky

content.detailedDescription: I and my frind neeraj sit in play ground time 10 i see two lights north i and my fnd and more pepole see this ligght two bolls the are move north to sowth the atre see 5 min.Anf slowly slowly go yo sowth and invisibal
content.summary: Two ligh come in north one is big and second one is small hight aprox. 600- 700 f.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside and saw two orange lights in formationtravelkink north far faster thanany aircraft with absolutely no noise. total time of visibility was only 5 seconds but objects were at 2000 feet or so.
content.summary: Two lights moving information, far too fast to be civilian, no noise at a.

content.detailedDescription: I was experimenting with astrophotography in my back yard and noticed a stationary object within a long exposure containing star trails. upon zooming in the object was disc shaped and appeared in only a handful of exposures and then disappeared. during an exposure a jet of some kind was flying at a very high altitude in the vicinity of the area. upon importing the raw photos into lightroom and zooming in even further the object moves in one frame and then disappears entirely.
content.summary: I was experimenting with astrophotography and noticed a stationary object within a long exposure containing star trails.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i went to dinner in the neighboring town of spearfish, sd.  as we were leaving the restaurant and getting into our truck, my wife said "what was that?".  i asked her what she meant and she asked "didn't you hear that?", which i hadn't, i had already shut my door.  i asked her what it sounded like and she described it as a boom-boom sound.  i didn't think much of it and we decided to drive home to lead via us hwy 14a, which is a scenic route through spearfish canyon in the black hills.  it was approximately 7:20pm and the skies were crystal-clear.  spearfish canyon is very winding and has high canyon walls on either side making for a limited field of view most of the time, but as we rounded a corner, i looked up and saw this bizarre smoke trail in the sky to the west.  i drove on a little ways looking for a better view and a place to pull off of the road.  the photos i took with my cell-phone camera are better than i expected considering it was the first time i ever used it.  the two trail were visually close enough and on the same trajectory to be obviously related.  the upper, or larger of the two was very broad and straight, being slightly denser on the upper and lower edges as though it may have been cylindrical as opposed to appearing flat.  the second, or lower trail was very bright and sharp in appearance and was very obviously created by a spiraling object.  i am fairly certain that what i saw was the smoke trail of something burning up and breaking up on re-entry.  unfortunately i did not see the actual object that created this smoke trail. but in my best estimation i would say that, based on the time it took to completely disperse (about 20 minutes), i missed it by about 5 - 10 minutes.  this would correspond to the time my wife heard the booms.  it appeared to me that whatever left the lower trail was burning, spiraling, and possibly breaking apart because there were intermittent bright spots, not evenly spaced along the trail, that looked like places that trailed small fragments as there were smaller streaks of smoke around these bright spots.  i'm not sure if the photos are good enough to show that much detail, though.  i'm not asserting that this was anything extraterrestrial, but it was very unusual.  i've seen a lot of con-trails and have even seen the "chain-of-pearls" type of con-trail here and what i saw today did not resemble a con-trail.  i was fortunate enough to have witnessed the re-entry of skylab when i was a boy, and this looked very similar to the smoke trails it left.  the smoke trails i saw today appeared to be at a lower altitude than that, though.  i'm no trained spotter, but i am an army veteran and former law enforcement officer.  though it's very difficult, if not impossible to judge the altitude and range of the smoke trail, i would take a wild guess at between 20k and 50k feet and maybe 5 to 25 miles distant.  hard to tell not knowing what it was.  anyway, just wanted to pass this along to you guys.  i think it's worth looking into, especially if you've received any other related reports.  i'd bet my paycheck on my opinion that it was an object breaking up in the atmosphere.  maybe space-junk, maybe a large meteor, but definitely not a con-trail.  feel free to call me if you have any questions, and please let me know if you figure out what this was.  thank you.
content.summary: Photos of spiraling double smoke trail w/ possible sonic boom heard. . .
